data.title: Advanced reporting capabilities
data.description: Build report templates with custom data settings. Share a report template as global favorite for others in yoru company to use.

data.title: Schedule reports
data.description: Create report templates with dynamic criteria. Schedule reports to be run and sent over email at set frequency.

data.title: Automate recurring expenses
data.description: Manage recurring expenses by - scheduling a transaction to post on a future date, at set recurring intervals.

data.title: Plan and track budgets
data.description: Define budgets at expense category level for each month, and compare it with the actual expenses - month on month.

data.title: Future prediction
data.description: Using statistical analysis and trend line analysis, fortuna can predict various useful numbers for the future. Example: Expense for remaining days in the current month.
